ext_desc.message: Surfa på YouTube som om det vore 2015!

ext_name_by.message: YouTube Classic Polymer Theme av Frellwit
ext_name_by.description: The name of the extension by author

ext_refresh.message: Uppdatera alla öppna YouTube-flikar så att inställningarna träder i kraft.
ext_refresh.description: Telling the user to refresh any open youtube tabs

ext_disablemp.description: The option to auto-close the miniplayer

ext_collapse.description: The option to collapse the guide menu

ext_livepreviews.description: The option to disable live thumbnail previews

ext_oldlogo.description: The option to use the old logotype

ext_listdisplay.description: The option to display channel videos as a list

ext_navbar.description: The option to display the old horizontal navigation bar

ext_homescroll.message: Ersätt oändlig scroll med en ladda mer-knapp på rekommenderade videor
ext_homescroll.description: The option to replace inifite scrolling with a load more button on the home recommendations grid

ext_channelscroll.message: Ersätt oändlig scroll med en ladda mer-knapp på kanalvideor och spellistor
ext_channelscroll.description: The option to replace inifite scrolling with a load more button on the channel videos grid

c_home.description: The home link on the nav bar menu

c_trending.description: The trending link on the nav bar menu

c_subs.description: The subscription link on the nav bar menu
